SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class EventTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.EventTest
public class EventTest extends Object
Unit tests for Event.

These tests validate the behaviour of Event while ensuring that no real Firebase network operations are triggered. By mocking FirebaseDatabase and replacing FirebaseService instances through reflection, the test suite runs entirely in a local JVM context.

Key Behaviours Verified

  • Event.createEvent() correctly pushes a new event and calls FirebaseService.addEntry(HashMap, String) with the expected key
  • All getters and setters behave consistently and preserve state
  • Graceful handling of null and optional fields in event creation

Testing Strategy

  • Static mocking of FirebaseDatabase.getInstance(String) prevents SDK initialisation
  • All DatabaseReference chains are simulated, including push() and getKey()
  • FirebaseService is injected via reflection to intercept Firebase writes

This test suite ensures that Event can safely construct and persist metadata to Firebase while correctly managing its internal state and data consistency.
